body: What do you think of implementing a checkbox that would le you hide your account when posting/commenting?
body_html: What do you think of implementing a checkbox that would le you hide your account when posting/commenting?
title: Anonymous posting

body:
Good idea, I like it. Not really necessary with the ability to set your profile to private already, but as an option I don't see why not.

Could lead to more spam and trolling though.
body_html:
Good idea, I like it. Not really necessary with the ability to set your profile to private already, but as an option I don't see why not.

Could lead to more spam and trolling though.

post.body: What do you think of implementing a checkbox that would le you hide your account when posting/commenting?
post.body_html: What do you think of implementing a checkbox that would le you hide your account when posting/commenting?
post.title: Anonymous posting

body:
Absolutely fuck that. Your profile can already be set to private to avoid brigades. Voat implemented an anonymous option and it ended absolutely terribly. It basically gave people an excuse to troll and they would organize outside of the website and spam shit in the anonymous subs. 

Please admins do not do this. Accounts are already anonymous, you just create a fake name.
body_html:
Absolutely fuck that. Your profile can already be set to private to avoid brigades. Voat implemented an anonymous option and it ended absolutely terribly. It basically gave people an excuse to troll and they would organize outside of the website and spam shit in the anonymous subs.

Please admins do not do this. Accounts are already anonymous, you just create a fake name.

post.body: What do you think of implementing a checkbox that would le you hide your account when posting/commenting?
post.body_html: What do you think of implementing a checkbox that would le you hide your account when posting/commenting?
post.title: Anonymous posting

body:
Since trolls will create throwaway accounts anyway, why not spare the legit users from having to create multiple accounts?

Also just because a profile is set to private doesn't mean you can't make a google search like

```-site:ruqqus.com "username"```
body_html:
Since trolls will create throwaway accounts anyway, why not spare the legit users from having to create multiple accounts?

Also just because a profile is set to private doesn't mean you can't make a google search like

-site:ruqqus.com "username"

post.title: Anonymous posting

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: I think this would be a great idea and reduce the need for making throwaways, there's a reason why lots of sites have that. The only problem I can see with it is that you wouldn't be able to tell posters and commenters apart if they're using this feature. The current private profile option doesn't hide your username, and it'll basically be rendered useless as soon as any kind of crawler like pushshift gets developed for this site.
body_html: I think this would be a great idea and reduce the need for making throwaways, there's a reason why lots of sites have that. The only problem I can see with it is that you wouldn't be able to tell posters and commenters apart if they're using this feature. The current private profile option doesn't hide your username, and it'll basically be rendered useless as soon as any kind of crawler like pushshift gets developed for this site.

post.body: What do you think of implementing a checkbox that would le you hide your account when posting/commenting?

post.title: Anonymous posting

body:
My thoughts as well about the crawlers. 

As for telling people apart, they could get the same id/name assigned throughout the thread.

Anything else I think they could do with a throwaway account anyway.
¯\_༼ •́ ͜ʖ •̀ ༽_/¯
body_html:
My thoughts as well about the crawlers.

As for telling people apart, they could get the same id/name assigned throughout the thread.

Anything else I think they could do with a throwaway account anyway. ¯_༼ •́ ͜ʖ •̀ ༽_/¯
